definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: err (‖ from of [[טָעָה]], q.v.; Aram (sts.) [[תְּעָא]], [[תְּעִי]] id.; NH = BH (rare));—
physically, wander about, abs. Ex 23:4 (E) Is 35:8, Is 53:6, Job 38:41, Ps 119:176; c. [[ב]] loc. Ge 21:14, Ge 37:15 (JE), Pr 7:25, Ps 107:4; c. [[ל]] loc. Is 47:15; acc. loc. Is 16:8.
of intoxication, c. [[בְּ]] of wine Is 28:7; [[מן]] of wine v:Is 28:7; fig. of perplexity, subj. [[לבב]] Is 21:4.

ethically, abs. Ez Eze 44:10, Eze 48:11, Eze 48:11, Eze 48:11, Ps 58:4, prob. Pr 14:22 (cf. [[חוטא]] v:Pr 14:21, but Bu Toy go astray to ruin); [[תּׂעֵי רוח]] Is 29:24, [[תּׂעֵי לבב]] Ps 95:10; c. [[מן]] Ps 119:110, Pr 21:16, [[מֵאַחֲרַי]] Ez Eze 14:11, [[מֵעָלַי]] Ez Eze 44:10, Eze 44:15.

definitions.title: Niph. 1.
definitions.body: be made to wander about, as a drunkard: Inf. cstr. [[הִתָּעוֹת]] Is 19:14.
ethically: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִתְעָה]] be led astray Job 15:31 (c. [[בשׁוֹא]]).
physically: cause to wander about: abs. Is 30:28 (of bridle, in fig.), Pr 10:17; Je 50:6 (acc. of people as sheep); acc. pers. Pr 12:26; c. [[מן]] loc. Ge 20:13 (E), [[ב]] loc. Job 12:24 = Ps 107:40.

mentally and morally: cause to err, mislead: abs. Is 3:12, Is 9:15, Ho 4:12; c. acc. pers. Am 2:4, Mic 3:5, 2Ki 21:9 = 2Ch 33:9, Je 23:13, Je 23:32; c. [[ב]] obj. Je 42:20 (so Gf; Ke al. (so Pr 10:17) intr. err at cost of; LXX Ew Du Co [[הֲרֵעׂתֶם]]); c. [[מן]] of ´[[י]]: Is 63:17.
